unnormalised: **Builder Reviews: Are You Doing Your Homework Before Buying?**
normalised: **Builder Reviews: Are You Doing Your Homework Before Buying?**

unnormalised: Mumbai - Forget the glossy brochures and Bollywood-style ads! Savvy homebuyers are increasingly turning to builder reviews before plonking down their hard-earned Rs. for that dream apartment. Sites like NoBroker and Housing.com now host extensive reviews, giving potential buyers the inside scoop on construction quality, delivery timelines, and even hidden charges.
normalised: Mumbai - Forget the glossy brochures and Bollywood-style ads! Savvy homebuyers are increasingly turning to builder reviews before plonking down their hard-earned rupees for that dream apartment. Sites like NoBroker and Housing dot com now host extensive reviews, giving potential buyers the inside scoop on construction quality, delivery timelines, even hidden charges.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma, a professor at IIT Delhi, advises checking multiple sources. "Don't just rely on one website," he cautions. "Look for consistent patterns across different platforms. Also, consider reviews in light of the project's location; a delayed project in Gurgaon, for instance, might have different causes than one in Chennai."
normalised: Doctor Sharma, a professor at I I T Delhi, advises checking multiple sources. "Don't just rely on one website," he cautions. "Look for consistent patterns across different platforms. Also, consider reviews in light of the project's location; a delayed project in Gurgaon, for instance, might have different causes than one in Chennai."

unnormalised: Remember that gleaming 2BHK flat promised in 6 months? Reviews might reveal delays stretching to over a year. And that "free" modular kitchen? Turns out, installation costs extra! With property prices soaring, doing your research is more crucial than ever. Protect your investment, folks! A little digging can save you a lot of heartache (and Rs.) down the line, especially if you're looking at a sizable 1200 sq ft property.
normalised: Remember that gleaming two B H K flat promised in six months? Reviews might reveal delays stretching to over a year. And that "free" modular kitchen? Turns out, installation costs extra! With property prices soaring, doing your research is more crucial than ever. Protect your investment, folks! A little digging can save you a lot of heartache (and rupees) down the line, especially if you're looking at a sizable one thousand two hundred square feet property.
